slides.title: 0: Pentagon Militarizes Local Police Departments
slides.text: The pentagon has calculated that the equipment received in 2006 cost around $5 million. Federal initiatives to provide funding and equipment to police have come under tremendous scrutiny surronding the issue of transparency
